definition: of or belonging to endocrine glands or their secretions, any of the glands of the endocrine system that secrete hormones directly into the bloodstream
details:
adjective
- of or belonging to endocrine glands or their secretions
= example: of or belonging to endocrine glands or their secretions
= synonyms: endocrinal
noun
- any of the glands of the endocrine system that secrete hormones directly into the bloodstream
= synonyms: endocrine gland
- the secretion of an endocrine gland that is transmitted by the blood to the tissue on which it has a specific effect
= synonyms: hormone, internal secretion
